attributes.action: Investigate the violation of graves at Tottenham park cemetery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My great grandparents, grandad and uncles graves have been violated either by being turned over, new bodies placed on top of there burial plot and gravestones no longer there. There are many other graves which have been violated in this way and we think it is disrespectful and damn right rude of the new owners. We want a full investigation as to why the families have never been informed and what they plan to do about it.
